coreAttributes.name: Skirren Gas
coreAttributes.description: A canister, containing an artificially made gas. Whilst not providing anything when consumed, it is used as punishment for criminals by transforming then into Skirrens. Luckily as a safety precaution, you have to enchant it for its transformative capabilities to take effect. "When enchanting side effects may include: abnormal amounts of energy, sudden bursts of joy, hair and tail growth and becoming an idiot (if not already)".
